com.maxleap

Class MLMarketing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxleap.MLMarketing

  • public final class MLMarketing
extends Object
    This class provides the ability to manage the in-app message.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MLMarketing.InAppMessageDismissButtonLocation
      This class represent the location of an in-app message dismiss button.
